channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping at 5.30am, 7th August
item.description:
Someone in an orange high vis outfit (white, balding) was carrying a black bin down london lane and dumping black bags in bins, piling them high on the morning of bin collection day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Lane, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping along Cobourg Road, 7th August
item.description:
Please drive along Cobourg Road - there have been various furniture items dumped. Please remove them asap - they attract more unlawful fly tipping from others. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cobourg Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car park Bell Street under Burne House, 7th August
item.description:
Fire alarm continuously going all night and still doing so now. Happens all the time. No one comes out to it and no lfb presence as I believe their policy has changed on this rogue call outs, Can someone from Westminster Council or the noise team action this for one and for all? Car park is a haven from drug addicts so maybe they set the alarm off but as itâ€™s not staffed the alarm never gets switched off. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corlett Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge, 7th August

item.title: General rubbish, 7th August
item.description:
This rubbish has been left in our alley way between Madison gardens & first Avenue for over 4 weeks, and of course now other rubbish is gradually joining it. I am always walking up there picking up rubbish but do not understand why this alley is no longer swept, on a Thursday not sure if it was weekly or bi weekly we always used to have the road sweeping small vehicle go down there, this now seems to have stopped. Could this rubbish please be collected, young children us this & families it is a very popular cut through and horrible to see the neglect Thanks for your help

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Madison Gardens, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mini-skip bag and random litter, 7th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Abbey Lane, Beckenham, London

item.title: Daily fly tipping that spills out everywhere on the road, 7th August
item.description:
Every morning in the same corner of the road, someone has dumped streams of rubbish. This has been going on for months. From an old sofa, to dozens of bags of old clothes, waste, old kitchen appliances - everything is dumped there

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Marks Rise, Hackney, London
